Elements

Class EventStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • Elements.EventStream

  • public class EventStream
extends java.lang.Object
    An EventStream is used to encapsulate a stream of Event objects which is used to encapsulate a piece of music.*

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EventStream(java.util.List<Event> events, Scale localScale)
      Create an EventStream object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventStream

        public EventStream(java.util.List<Event> events,
                   Scale localScale)
        Create an EventStream object.
        Parameters:
        events - a list of Event objects which represents the stream of events
        localScale - the scale associated with the EventStream

    • Method Detail

      • getLocalScale

        public Scale getLocalScale()
        Returns:
        the Scale associated with this EventStream object

      • getEvent

        public Event getEvent(int position)
        Retrieves an Event object at the specified position.
        Parameters:
        position - the position from which to retrieve the Event object
        Returns:
        an Event object at the given position, or null if the position is greater than the EventStream length

      • getEventList

        public java.util.List<Event> getEventList()
        Returns:
        an ordered List containing the stream of Event objects
